Ayres to sing and play to the lute and basse-violl. VVith pauins, galliards, almaines, and corantos for the lyra violl. By William Corkine. Ayres, 2nd book Corkine, William, fl. 1610-1612.
[26] p. : music
Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Browne, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard in Fleete-streete, London : 1610.
Signatures: A-G² (-G2, blank?). Considerable print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
